actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-847.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5395) to authorize appropriations for the Department of Energy for national security programs for fiscal year 1985, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5395 (Department of Energy nuclear weapons programs funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5395) to authorize appropriations for the Department of Energy for national security programs for fiscal year 1985, and for other purposes.
